name: Creature Feature (azza5442, SAE Dominic Au)
description:
Description

This is a tech demo to show the skills that Dom and Aaron have learnt over the course of the trimester, this demo simulates artificial life through the use of AI, Pathfinding, Terrain Generation and Saving and Loading.

This is only watchable with the ability to change which animal you are watching.


How To Play

This game is played using a Mouse

Press Space to generate a new map

Press C to change cameras

Press the Save button to save

Press the Load button to load
